title: The Unexpected Heroics of David Peterson

story.text: David Peterson, a devoted teacher with a love for guiding, begins his week as usual at the community center, unknowingly about to discover his superhuman abilities.
While teaching a class on creative problem solving, David accidentally discovers his power to see moments into the future, which helps him prevent a small accident in the classroom.
Inspired by his new abilities, David subtly uses his powers to help his students excel, guiding them precisely when they are about to make mistakes, without revealing his secret.
News spread of the uncanny success rates in David’s classes. He humbly attributes it to hard work, but begins to wonder about the extent of his powers.
Attempting to control his abilities, David helps a lost child in the mall with his future-sight, guiding her back to her parents amidst a bustling crowd.
Emboldened, David decides to use his power beyond the classroom. He volunteers at a local event, preempting problems and ensuring it runs smoothly.
At the week’s end, David reflects on his unexpected journey. He commits to using his powers to not only teach but also to make his community a safer place.

ending: Thus, David Peterson embraced his role as an everyday superhero, proving that heroism can manifest in the most unassuming figures.
moral: Great power doesn't always come with grandeur; sometimes, it is the quiet guidance and foresight that makes one a true superhero.
